duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer various alcohol and drug tests, such as random, pre-employment, post-accident, reasonable suspicion, return-to-duty, and follow-up.

Coordinate the scheduling of alcohol or drug tests and determine the appropriate offices, Breath Alcohol Technician (BAT), and/or subcontractor performing the tests according to location or other factors.
Understand and maintain knowledge of current DOT regulations and HHS Guidelines for testing and collections.
Handle conflict resolution and problem collections, including fatal and correctable flaw processing, chain of custody, donor privacy, and avoidance of offensive or inappropriate statements.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED, Breath Alcohol Technician (BAT) and Urine Specimen Collector certification, Minimum two (2) years testing and collection experience, Possess a valid Driver’s License
